channel.title: actor-model on sin-ack's writings
channel.description: Recent content in actor-model on sin-ack's writings

item.title: The inner workings of ZigSelf's actor model
item.description: Hi there. I wanted to do a series of deep dives about various parts of ZigSelf in order to give others a more thorough explanation of how everything works, and also as a braindump in order to verify my thinking. The first post I wanted to make is regarding ZigSelf’s implementation of the actor model, as it’s the feature I believe is one of the most interesting aspects of the language.
